html:
2025-0919
2025-12-11FINCustoms TariffOrder Amending the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025)Order Amending the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025) in order to (1) extend relief for public health, public safety and national security entities until June 30, 2026; (2) extend relief for steel goods used in manufacturing, processing, food and beverage packaging and agricultural production to January 31, 2026; and (3) extend relief for aluminum goods used in manufacturing, processing and agricultural production to June 30, 2026; and (4) grant new relief for goods used for the manufacturing of motor vehicles, aerospace goods and related parts starting February 1, 2026, and until June 30, 2026.Registration: SOR/2025-0269 Publication Date: 2025-12-31
subject: Order Amending the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025)
precis: Order Amending the United States Surtax Remission Order (2025) in order to (1) extend relief for public health, public safety and national security entities until June 30, 2026; (2) extend relief for steel goods used in manufacturing, processing, food and beverage packaging and agricultural production to January 31, 2026; and (3) extend relief for aluminum goods used in manufacturing, processing and agricultural production to June 30, 2026; and (4) grant new relief for goods used for the manufacturing of motor vehicles, aerospace goods and related parts starting February 1, 2026, and until June 30, 2026.
